channel.title: Braeden Silver Blog
channel.description: Updates from Braeden Silver's projects, research, and lab notes.

item.title: Secret Menu Refresh and Friendlier IEEE Directions
item.description: Gave the footer Easter eggs a new trigger sequence and rewrote the TXST IEEE project walkthrough so it sounds like a conversation, not a manual.

item.title: Prepping a GitHub Workshop for IEEE
item.description: Shared a new GitHub Pages project with our IEEE team and polished the site with a version counter and smarter banner updates.

item.title: Dark Mode, Guestbook Experiments, and More Maintenance
item.description: Tried out a giscus-powered guestbook, refreshed visuals with Monokai dark mode, and kept learning about SaaS while planning future creative work.

item.title: Why I'm Starting This Blog
item.description: Setting an intention to share daily notes on projects, lessons, and curiosities across engineering, art, and play.
